Naruto was walking down a section of Konoha, minding his own business. Today he wore an orange sleeveless vest, a pair of jean shorts held up by the belt, and in place of his shinobi sandals were a pair of blue flip flops.

For the most part, the other citizens that passed him by seemed to just go on with their own business. While that wasn't too bad in of itself, it was hard to keep his cool, since his ears picked up a few instances of snickering directed him, particularly because of when Naruto was thoroughly humiliated by Temari in front of the Chunin Exam spectators. While Naruto's body recovered from the fight, his pride was an entirely different story. The fact that he defeated Neji, only to wind up loosing, due to the fan wielding kunoichi yanking his undies. It was bad enough putting up with the snickering, but he also had the displeasure being referred to as "The Most Wedgie Prone Ninja" on certain occasions thanks to that incident.

All because Temari had to go and quote un quote: "teach him a lesson in humility"..

As the short blonde boy sighed angrily and made a turn around the corner of the street, he unexpectedly bumped into something.

"Hey watch where- "

Naruto looked up to see a familiar face that brought upon a torrent of embarrassed, frustrated, and quite frankly, discomforting thoughts. T'was Temari herself, still having four pig tails, still much taller than him, and still carrying her fan around.

Said fan using kunoichi herself wore a white t-shirt with the sand symbol on the chest area, and a pair of dark grey cargo pants held up by a belt.

"Wellll, never thought I'd get to meet up with you during my visit back here. How've you been small-fry? Still digging out those froggy print briefs I yanked up your butt?" Temari asked him with a voice full of mirth and cheekiness.

"I'm fine, thanks.." Naruto said as he scowled at her.

"Oh come on, don't be like that.. You had it coming anyway, what with you getting cocky and all.." Temari said to him as she placed her hands on her hips.

"…….. I want a rematch.."

"Beg your pardon?"

"I. Want. A. Rematch.." Naruto ground out to her.

Temari raised an eyebrow as the corners of her mouth formed into a grin; "Ohhhh? Are you sure you want that?"

"Yes I'm sure!"

Temari surpressed a laugh as her smile increased; "Good to hear.."
--

Later, the two were inside the same building where the genin fought during the preliminaries of the Chunin exams, except now, it was empty. As they faced off, Temari called out to him.

"Let's make this interesting, shall we? No ninjutsu, just melee combat!"

Naruto was puzzled at this, but decided to go along with it; "Fine.. Bring it on!!"

Temari chuckled a bit at the shorter blonde's declaration as she was thinking to herself; "He has no idea how many techniques he's inspired me to create.. And I get to try them out all on him~ "

Temari then finished her thoughts as she said to Naruto; "All right Shrimp-o! Come at me with all you've got!!"

Naruto didn't need to be asked twice, as he dashed at the kunoichi, his flip flops flying off as a result of his running, leaving him bare-footed. As he cocked his right fist back and threw it, he found himself hitting nothing but air. The momentum caused him stumble a bit as he as he turned and faced Temari, who was giving a small smile at him, without even so much as a scratch on her. Growling, he then rushed at her again. As he threw his right hand at her again, he hit, not Temari's face, but something her fan. When combining the momentum behind the punch, and how hard the fan was, naturally, Naruto's hand hurt like hell. As he cradled his right hand with his left hand, he felt that himself being knocked to the floor, courtesy of Temari swinging her fan to the side of his temple.

Naruto's head was ringing as he slowly got to his feet, as he fought the urge to fall again, Temari put her fan aside as she threw it to the top of the balcony; "Y'know, you're not exactly off to a good start.." As he charged at her again, she once again used his momentum against him as she casually tripped him, causing him to land on his back.

The instant Naruto scrambled to his feet, and found that Temari wasn't in the spot she was again; "Where di-"

"Right here.." Temari whispered into his ear from behind as she quickly lifted the boy off the ground with her arms passing under Naruto's armpits, and locking the hands on the back of his neck; "Tell me.. Have you actually won a fight WITHOUT using your clones?"

Naruto growled a bit as he kicked a bit, trying to get back to the ground, though the taller girl's strong hold on him didn't exactly make it easy.

"Thought so.. Might wanna quit while you're still ahead pipsqueak.." Temari said with a matter of fact tone of voice.

"NEVER!!" Naruto said, his pride obviously showing as he tried even harder to get out of her hold, only for Temari start to spin him around while keeping him in the hold. Soon enough, with the proper momentum and speed, Temari released her hold, throwing the boy a considerable distance as he skidded to a stop at 25 feet.

"Well, you leave me no choice shortstuff! I've been going easy on you from the start, but since you're so eager, I won't hold back as much. I've got some techniques I created especially for you after our last match..." Temari crossed her arms as she waited for Naruto to get up; "Hope you enjoy them kid, I know I will~"

As Naruto turned around to ask what she meant by that, he saw that she somehow disappeared again.

The first article of clothing he put on was a long-sleeved white t-shirt with the sleeves being bright orange in color. Followed by the shirt then came a pair of blue bib overalls with the buckles of the straps each being in the distinctive shape of a leaf, and a yellow spiral on the chest pocket of the overalls.

Once Naruto finished closing up all of the buttons attached to the hip area of the overalls, he put on both his shuriken and kunai knife holsters, he then packed said projectile weapons into the holsters as he then went to his kitchen where he got himself one of the protein bars that Kakashi had given him. As got one bite finished, his ears picked up the distinct sound of someone ringing the doorbell of his apartment. Curious, he walked to the door and opened it up, then proceeded to stick his head out to see who was tapping his window. Oddly enough, there didn't seem to be anything outside. With his eyebrows raised, he then walked out and locked his door to see if he could find whoever it was that was knocking his door, all the while hoping that no one was ding dong ditching him.

So focused was he into looking for the glass tapper that he didn't even notice something wrap around his chest until it was too late as he yelped from being suddenly yanked upwards off the ground. As if to confirm the familiarity, the snakes released their hold on the boy, who found himself dangling in midair by someone's hand on the straps of his blue garment, with that same someone's familiar voice reaching his voice.

111332222222222222222122221.content:
His childhood friend, Tenten Higurashi, who stood there casually, a cheeky grin adorned on her face.

"I hardly call receiving a shoulder wedgie a fun time Ten-chan..." Naruto retorted with a roll of his eyes as he brushed himself off.

"Maybe if you woke up on time, your skivvies wouldn't be yanked up your crack.." Tenten replied, gently nudging his chin with her fist.

"Easy for you to say Ten-chan.." Naruto grinned as she gave him the affectionate nudge, something that she'd done with him since childhood.

"Anyway, we better get going Naru-kun, don't wanna be late for training, now do we?" Tenten asked him. The blonde boy nodded in agreement, as the two leapt onto a building and began their trek to the training ground.

Kushina watched the two from a window, smiling as a memory came to her.

----
It was just a month before the graduation exam of the academy, as twelve year old Tenten stared down some mechanical dummies, all of them dressed up as enemy nin, focus evident in her eyes.

As soon as one of them had taken a step forward, Tenten had leapt forward, launching a side kick to its head and launching it into a couple of other dummies. She swiftly back flipped over a dummy that attempted to grab her from behind; and as soon as she landed on her feet, she reached her hands into its pants, and yanked its tightly whities up, lifting it off the ground as it attempted to get away, only for Tenten spin around and slam it into the ground.

She swiftly got behind another dummy, and proceeded to pull its boxer briefs so hard and fast, that she was able to pull it over its face and hook it underneath its chin in one swift yank, causing it to stumble around. This was followed by Tenten sneaking up on a couple of other dummies, and just like the other two, they were thoroughly wedgeied.

As soon as she tied the underwear of two other dummies together, of course, she heard someone call out: "Yame!"

Tenten stopped as the dummies powered down, collapsing to the ground. The girl then turned and bowed to the source of the voice, who turned out to be none other than Kushina herself.

"Excellent Tenten-chan! You've gotten faster, more precise! NoT mention your kick, It's got more power than a mule's!" Kushina beamed as she looked at her.

"T-thank you Kushina-sensei, I've made sure to practice in my free time whenever possible.." Tenten said with a bit of bashfulness from the praise. She cleared her throat, briefly (no pun intended) at the thoroughly wedgeied dummies before looking back at Kushina; "I'm just glad that I have a kunoichi as great as you teaching me.. I'm probably the luckiest girl.."

"Why do you say that Tenten-chan?" Kushina asked her, raising an eyebrow in confusion.

"I mean.. You could've taught anyone else these techniques.. But the fact that you chose me is a miracle in of itself. I don't even come from a clan, so it just makes me feel all the more lucky.."

Kushina gave a gentle grin as she walked up to the younger girl, putting an arm around her shoulders; "Trust me when I say, I chose you for a reason.. Luck didn't have anything to do with it." She said as she walked with Tenten out of the dojo; " When you and Naru-chan were out back practicing with your kunai four years ago, I felt something inside of you.. It was like a spark, waiting to be ignited into its full potential."

Tenten gave a slight blush at her praise.

"It was exactly then that I knew, that you would be the one that I would teach these techniques to.. When I'm gone, someone will need to carry on not only the legacy of these techniques, but my title as 'Wedgie Queen'.. And I know, with what I'm teaching you, combined with your sensei's teachings after you become a genin, you'll be one hell of a kunoichi.. One that my son will be able to count on to watch his back in the field of battle.. And keep him in line of course" Kushina said the last part jokingly as she chuckled.

"...... I'll make sure your teachings won't go to waste, sensei.. You can count on that." Tenten said with an affirmative nod.

"I know.. Now, let's go upstairs.. Naru-chan's probably done with his nap, and it's getting close to dinner."
----

Back in the present, Tenten smiled a bit as she leapt alongside Naruto, recalling her times training with Kushina, which only strengthened her vow as a kunoichi to carry on her title and techniques.

Let's hope Naru-kun's ready for what I have in store during training~ She mischievously thought to herself.

"What is it Kakashi-sensei?"

"Naruto, your teammates have been voicing some concerns."

"Well...I think it might be the wedgies."

"Um...possibly. But that's beside's the point. Your teammates say that they would have preferred to have never had to get revenge in the first place. I can understand their concerns..."

"OHHHH my gosh, so, what, I gotta stop or something...?"

"Well...Yeah."

"What!? Aw, come on! Is it really that big a deal?"

"...Hm. I guess you just need a lesson in empathy, then. Alright."

Moving behind his student with a flash, Kakashi yanked his bright red panties to the back of his neck in one pull. "EEAAA...!" Naruto was pulled on to his tippy toes as his sensei continued to speak to him in his usual laid back manner. "If, by the end of this, you still think its "No big deal", then you can take your chances with your teammates if your really eager for more retribution. But for now..." Kakashi snapped the waistband over Naruto's head in just one more pull, sending the genins hands down to his now aching crotch. "AHAAOW..." Naruto stumbled forward, the shock from the sudden atomic wedgie leaving him to stunned to try and pry his undies of his head.

Maybe Ill just drive it home for you, kay?" Kakashi began bouncing Naruto like this, slightly tearing the boxers further and further into his tush each time he fell against them. "Ah-AHA-AHOW!-" Naruto held his hands against his wedgied rear, trying to alleviate the simultaneous feelings of burning and tingling. For some reason, his sensei doing this to him felt much better than one of his fellow genin. Naruto didn't question it, letting light moans come in between his yelps.

Kakashi took no notice as ha bounced Naruto as hard as he could, soon stretching the leg holes to the back of his neck as he dropped Naruto three feet each time. "AAAAAH! UUNNN! UHUNNG..." Naruto had no time to argue as Kakashi put his leg holes through the strongest branch on the tree, hanging him three feet off the ground to dangle helplessly.

"So...how does this make you feel?" Naruto blushed profusely as he asked this. "U-uhm...."

"No, it means I stopped caring. But if your going to keep pranking your teammates, try and space those pranks a little more apart at least."

"Oh...Okay...does that mean you'll get me down?"

"No, I'm good." Kakashi then walked away, leaving Naruto hanging in the tree outside of the academy.

"Ah-Hey! Ah....oh well..."

Naruto was content to hang there for a little while, the tingling out weighing the burning in his tushy. "Mmm..."

111332222222222222222222211.content:
In the meeting room of the Akatsuki, two of its members were conversing in private about. One being Pain, the leader of the Akatsuki, and his partner/second-in-command, Konan.

"Are you certain you only wish for me to scout Konoha?" The blue haired woman asked as she stood stood before him; "Surely, knowing you, there's more to it than that.."

Pain nodded as he then answered; "While your main goal is to spy on the village, I also want you to 'test' one of their shinobi."

"Is there anyone specific you have in mind?"

"Whichever one you test is up to you".

"Then I choose.. The Kyuubi's current container".

"Hmm.. Yes I do believe you have the right idea. If what Itachi and Kisame said are true, then it's likely that he's training in some of Jiraya's techniques."

"And if no one interferes, I'll see to it that I bring the boy to you.."

"Good.. I'll see you when you get back.." Pain gave a small smile.

Konan then activated her Dance of the Shikigami technique as she formed wings out of her paper, and promptly flew away, intent on carrying out her mission.

1113322222222222222222222111.content:
In Konoha, at Team Seven's currently empty training ground Naruto was training quite hard as he panted from the strenuous activity he was currently undergoing. Today, he wore a simple orange-yellow t-shirt with the konoha symbol on the chest, and a pair of red athletic shorts.

At the moment, he was sparring with his clones, though the numbers seemed to slowly be chipping away at his inhuman stamina.

Left and right he either punched or kicked a clone out of existence, while at the same time, taking a couple of hits himself.
-

Konan watched the boy from a paper tree created by her, wearing a mask similar to the Anbu, though the only difference was that it was more human in shape with a woman's face on the front, and covered her entire head, even concealing her blue hair while also wearing her Akatsuki robe.

Her gaze on the boy's training never wavered, but even then, she still made sure that her sense were attuned to her surroundings. Thankfully for her, there was no one near by the training area that the kyuubi's container was occupying.

"Hmm.. His stamina is immense, if his ability to create scores of shadow clones is anything to go by. But by the looks of things, there's still a limit to it.."

-

After a while, Naruto's training was finished, as he dispelled his remaining clones, then sat down to catch his breath for a few minutes or so.

Suddenly, the sound of rustling in the bushes caused Naruto to immediately stand up to quickly to find the source. As he walked around cautiously in his search however, he felt that someone pinch his left ear. Reflexively, Naruto attempted a backhand at whoever said this, only to miss as the momentum caused him to turn all the way around, just to see no one there.

As he turned around again, he bumped into someone taller than him. Before he could apologize though, he saw that this someone was wearing only a mask shaped like a woman's face, and a familiar looking black robe with red cloud prints on it. Naruto moved back ten feet from the figure as he quickly stood up again.

"Although your taijutsu could use much more polishing, your stamina is commendable, as is your commitment to training, that much I'll give you.." the figure complimented Naruto as her feminine yet stoic voice reached his ears. The boy's eyes bulged out slightly at learning that she was watching him.

"Who are you? And how long were you-"

"The entire time, but my name doesn't matter at the moment…" the mysterious woman replied to him with an eerie calmness. Naruto, in spite of his nervousness, did his best to conceal it. Remembering his encounter with Itachi and Kisame while he and Jiraya were searching for Tsunade, he knew that this woman more than likely wanted.. Though what she was capable of, however, was still a mystery to him.

Regardless, Naruto immediately created a large swarm of shadow clones that stood alongside him, ready to fight this woman. Unfortunately, they still had no idea just who they were going up against.

As Naruto and the clones charged at the woman, she suddenly moved in a blur.The smell of smoke entered Naruto's nostrils as he and some of his clones turned around to see that half of his clones were dispersed, the female Akatsuki member standing straight she seemed to be wielding a white ninjaken, with the blade protruding from her right sleeve, while Naruto and his clones gaped at the speed and skill of this mysterious woman,

-

Having dealt with the clones Konan, immediately drew her paper sword into her sleeve subtly, where it turned back into sheets of paper, with Naruto and the clones too shocked to notice.

"I suggest you stop struggling, and cooperate, boy.." Konan said to him without even turning around.

Naruto immediately snapped out of his stupor, along with his clones, as he snapped back; "Hell no!"

Suddenly, Konan ducked under a kick aimed at her head from behind and simultaneously launched a back kick at the clone behind her while sending a straight punch at a clone leaping at her from the front. Both blows causing the clones to dispel in a puff of smoke.

Konan turned around to find that an even bigger swarm of clones running at her, and without batting an eye or even breathing out a sigh, she charged at them as well..
-

Naruto leapt through the trees as fast as his legs could carry him. Hoping to Kami that his clones would keep that woman occupied long enough for him to reach the village.

After what felt like half an hour, Naruto stopped on a branch to catch his breath while he leaned against the tree. As soon as his breath was caught, he leapt down from the branch to the ground, and immediately started walking.

While walking, he took the time to listen to the sound of some of the forest animals, smiling a bit as he enjoyed this nature walk as well as the fact that he seemingly escaped his would-be kidnapper.

"I sure showed her.." He thought cockily to himself, but then snapped out of it as he realized something.. Things had suddenly gotten quieter. As he stopped to ponder what the reason for this was, he suddenly felt a feminine hand on his left shoulder. With a feeling of dread, he craned his head up a tad to see the owner of the hand.

And sure enough, it was the masked woman, as she looked down at him, Naruto then panically scrambled away from her as he pressed back to a tree.

"Did you think you could escape so easily?"
-

Konan smiled behind her mask in amusement as she saw Naruto visibly blush from her rhetorical question, but immediately became serious again.

"As clever as your diversion attempt was, it was all for nothing. Your clones can not, and will not help you in the slightest.."

Naruto's eyes suddenly turned red as a red aura of chakra surrounded him, much like when he fought Neji. As he attempted to run to the village again with his increased speed, Konan simply to suddenly get in front of him. While she was up close she sent him backwards with a strike he couldn't block in time.

As the boy landed on his back, he grimaced in pain from the blow to his stomach. As he got to his feet slowly, he found himself unable to use the kyuubi's chakra at the moment.

"No.. Nononono, please, not again!" Naruto began panicking as flashbacks to when Orochimaru sealed the Kyuubi's chakra flashed through his mind.

Konan, in the meantime, looked at a piece of paper she placed on Naruto's abdomen when she intercepted him; "Five Elements tag's first use, successful.. It might not have knocked him unconscious like the original technique, but it'll still seal block the kyuubi's chakra until someone unseals it."

Feeling satisfaction that her invention work, the paper using kunoichi walked over to the genin, who only backed away in response.

"Will you cooperate now?" she asked while advancing towards him; "You're only wasting time.."

"No! I don't want to go with you! You can't make me!" Naruto defiantly exclaimed to her as he attempted to run away again. This was once again intercepted, as Konan swiftly got behind him, and held him off the ground by the scruff of his shirt with her right hand.

"You've done nothing but make it more difficult for yourself, boy.." the woman said in a stern tone of voice as she held the squirming kid; "You could've easily avoided all of this, but you thought it was better to be a stubborn little brat.. If you won't cooperate freely, then, contrary to what you say, I WILL make you.." Konan reached her left hand into back of the struggling boy's pants. Naruto ceased struggling as he felt her grip on to the waistband of his tighty whities. "And if what I've learned about you is true, then I know just how to make you compliant.."

As Sasuke and Naruto continued their training of chakra tree climbing, Naruto was noticing a trend of Sasuke trailing ahead in the score. He wanted to have the opportunity to one up the Uchiha, but he still needed to wait for his chance...

"Well, Im going to head inside now with Tazuna. Keep training this technique until you feel you can no longer continue". Kakashi spoke to his students nonchalantly, knowing they would go just as far as they intended to with or without his permission. And for the next three hours, Naruto had barely managed to catch up to sasuke's height up the tree, with sasuke pushing himself even harder to elude naruto's grasp. With both their chakra's at an extreme low, they both prepared for a final dash up the tree. They were neck and neck as they raced up the massive oak, the end being just above their last slash marks. As sasuke poised himself for the finish, rushing ahead of Naruto with the last of his strength, his goal was in sight. Just before sasuke made it to the top, he felt a violent tug at the back of his white boxer breifs, ripping him off his horizontal footing and bouning him several times against the plentiful fabric, eliciting surprised yelps and moans from the completely surprised Uchiha. Sasuke regarded him with silence as he dug his undies out from his tingly cheeks.

Neji sat waiting on the wide roof top, waiting to meet someone here very soon. And, almost as if on Que, that someone appeared on top of the fence, holding a kunai with a note attached to it.

Neji merely smiled at his obvious sarcasm, stating evenly afterwards "I can understand how the concept might be lost upon someone who's most master attack strategy revolves around the subtle method of killing it with fire." After a moment of coughing in pain, Kiba forced himself to his feet as saw one of the two Sakon's step out of the others back, looking back smugly at him with an even darker expression than the one facing him with a wicked grin. "How perfect, brother. A two on two battle. It's been too long. Ill take care of the pet, you deal with the master."

"Sure thing, Ukon. Don't kill him quite yet, remember!" The other chuckled derisively, walking menacingly towards where Akamaru was picking himself up, growling defiantly at the apparent brother of the sound ninja. Kiba was still too stunned to think, not having ever heard of any technique or bloodline that would allow two ninja to hide in the other's body. Before he could tumble back, Sakon grabbed the front of his jacket with both hands and pulled him in for a knee right to his stomach. Sakon pulled Kiba up after this and looked in his face. Kiba was clenching his teeth, little rasps of pained breath coming through as he struggled to open his eyes. "Pfft. Pathetic." Sakon lifted the shorter ninja over his head easily, throwing him towards a large boulder. Kiba's eyes opened wide as he saw himself speeding headfirst towards a rocky impact, instinct taking over as he managed to spin his legs around and catch himself on the boulder. Reversing his momentum, Kiba then sprang off the rock towards the surprised looking Sakon. The brazen Inuzuka's head slammed into Sakon's face before he realized what was happening, the sudden impact causing him to pull back in pain, his nose already visibly leaking fresh blood down his face as he put both hands to it.

Ecstatic at getting a hit in, Kiba rushed in immediately to follow up this attack. "Hah...better than I would have expected from some rookie like you, but it makes no difference. Lemme drill into you just what position you are in here, dog boy...!" Kino Inuzuka was a recently accepted Chuunin, and proud of it. He was 16, stood at 5,9 and 195 pounds. He had jaw length, dirty blonde hair and green eyes. He wore a long sleeved black shirt with the symbol of Konoha on it. Over that, he wore the traditional chuunin vest Armour. He also wore dark grey cargo pants and traditional dark blue leaf sandals. He had the traditional paint of his clan on his face in the pattern of long, sideways green diamonds.

The exams had been almost hellishly difficult at some points, but he, his team, and his ever present dog companion had endured. This was his and his dogs first solo mission, and they had very nearly completed it. All they had to do was transport the scroll they currently had in their position back to Konoha. The dog in question was a small, no more than 45 pound wolf puppy named Yama. Yama was unusual, having learned how to talk very early in his life. Kino sighed even deeper, rubbing his head to alleviate the stress of old memories. "Yeah, me too. But were not working together for a while, so we can see them whenever we have some-

All of a sudden, Kino was jerked downwards while jumping from tree to tree. Barely having time to recover, Kino rolled along the ground for several feet before stopping himself. Kino knew the villages policy with giving enemy ninja information, but wanted to try and stall the impossibly strong swordsman. "What do you know about the Copy Ninja?" Kino inwardly cursed. He actually knew a great deal about the legendary leaf jounin, his sensei having asked him to help with his teams training as well as to spar him. Sakura Haruno struck the reinforced, ground mounted training bag with her chakra empowered fist, barely able to move it back an inch. The young chuunin sighed in exasperation, this being the same result she had gotten for the past three hours. "Tsunade wasn't kidding...this thing is crazy heavy...*Sigh* It doesn't matter. Tsunade says eight hours of punching, that's what she gets." With only a short breath to revitalize herself, Sakura was back to slamming her fist against the bag with all her strength.

Watching this display was from a good eighty feet back in the heavy brush of the deep training ground was a quietly chuckling Ino Yamanaka. "Working hard, huh Sakara? Looks tiring...Lets give you a little help, shall we?." Silently moving through the brush, Ino had no trouble moving behind the intensely tunnel visioned Sakura. Putting her thumbs and index fingers together, Ino made the unique hand sign of her family's jutsu.

In the next instant, Ino was looking through the eyes of the pink haired kunoichi. "Mind-body substitution...success!" Ino then strut over to her body and took a bright blue vial from her ninja pouch, unhesitatingly swallowing the strange cyan liquid. "Ich...tastes like fish oil." Ino reached into her pouch once more, retrieving a water jug and using it to wash the unpleasant taste out of Sakura's mouth as she carried her own body well out of sight of the training bag. After putting her body far enough away, Ino sprinted back towards where Sakura was training and released her jutsu. Sakura blinked a couple of times, suddenly dazed and confused as she stood panting in front of the training bag. Sakura shook her head back and forth, trying to regain some lucidity. "Jeez...this is harder than I thought. I'm zoning out like crazy...Oh well...Guess I just have to hit it HARDER!"

4 hours later...

Sakura finally fell to her knees, her body drenched in sweat from head to toe. "No...Why...I don't get it...." Sakura wheezed for air, her throat dry and burning from the heavy exertion of the last few hours. "Tsu...nade said...I could handle...eight hours... DAMMIT!!" In defiance of her own fatigue. Sakura bolted upright and hit the bag with everything she had. The force of the blow combined with the weakness in her legs made Sakura take a nosedive straight into the dirt. After her face hit the ground, Sakura slid about a foot before coming to a stop. "Ugggh...." Sakura lie there motionless, this indignity causing her morale to take a bigger dive than she did. The only solace Sakura took was knowing that no one had seen her do that.

"Aaaaaaaahahahahahaaaaaa! Nice faceplant, sweetie! That inanimate bag giving you some trouble? Did it dump your books and give you a wedgie too?" Sakura felt her heart jump into her throat as she heard the cackling laughter of her old classmate, her embarrassment quickly turning into rage as she stumbled to her feet. "F@#K you, Ino!! This stupid F%$king thing weighs more than ten of your anorexic asses!" Sakura's comeback only made Ino's laughter more uproarious, the girl not missing a beat in ruffling her old friends feathers. "Excused excuses Saki-poo. From where I'm standing it's definitely bag one, Sakura big fat zero!" Sakura clenched her fists as her lungs struggled to work up enough air for another string of curses. "Ino...you...!" Ino swayed back and forth whimsically as she approached the fuming girl. "Aww, whats wrong, Sa-ku-ra? Might you be worried that.." Ino made sure to whisper these last words in Sakura's ear with the most mocking tone she could muster "you wont measure up to our Kage's standards??"

Unable to take anymore of that voice, Sakura rocketed her fist towards Ino's mouth in the hope of silencing her.

Sure, she knows many impressive techniques but her shy, kind nature makes her doubt when to use them and that may cause her trouble. I have tried to bring her rage and energy out, but it never works. Every time I see a spark in her violet eyes, it quickly dies out the next second. I am starting to seriously lose hope”

That made the young woman nervous and was one of the reasons why she was constantly checking the road, waiting for some type of trap or ambush. Yet there still was none.

“I am happy to wait. I have a roof over my head, a nice fire and someone to make me company!” the blonde winked at Konan “Want to have a sleep-over later? I did not bring a pajama but if you could lend me one of yours I would not mind”

“Shut up” growled Konan. She would much prefer for her prisioner to be scared and trying to scape. That was something normal and Konan had come to expect it from her prisioners. The girl meanwhile did not look worried at all, like if she was being taken to some kind of tropical holiday instead of being captured by a dangerous organization. The blonde girl rose an eyebrow while a smirk grew on her face “Capture? I am sorry hun, but I think there is a mistake here”

Now it was Konan’s turn to be confused. The blonde was tied up, arms and legs covered with strong ropes and weights. There was no way she could scape from that. Only Konan had the keys to set her free and she was not going to do so until they were back to the principal Akatsuki base. There, she would finaly get rid of the blonde and take a nap. She did not know why, but this mission had gotten her realy tired. The young woman yawned. Her body felt heavy, like it weighted a ton and her right leg itched. “What is...” Konan finaly fell to the floor, exhausted. The last thing she heard before falling unconcious being Ino’s light chuckle.

Ino laughed and dragged a chair next to Konan before sitting on it.

“So, how’s it going?” grinned Ino “I am sorry for tying you up so tightly but I am not that good with ropes”

“What did you do to me?!” growled Konan.

“Used some special flowers when you were dragging me to this place. She stopped near the waistline and grabbed the kimono, pulling it up to show the tight, black shorts that now covered Konan’s bubble butt.

“What are you doing?!”snapped Konan.

“Just getting you ready for the next phase” Ino gently placed one finger over Konan’s behind and dragged it up to the thin line of red that came out of her shorts “Bingo”

1253322222222122221111212122.content:
While Ino gave Tsume the wedgie of a lifetime, another woman slowly aproached the Yamanaka residence. Osini had had to go to the Hokage tower to arrange the supplies of the different plants that her clan grew. She had arrived with the notes ready and some small amounts of each plant so that the Hokage had examples of every one of it. But when she had talked with Shizune, Tsunade’s secretary, the young, black haired woman had apologized and told her that the Hokage was now in a reunion with Mei Terumi, the Mizukage of the hidden village of the mist.

“Do you know if they will end soon?” asked Osini.

Two seconds after that moment the wall at Shizune’s right exploded as a figure was shot through it. Osini had only a few moments to see what was going on, but she managed to recognise Tsunade as she flew through the air like a bullet, her eyes and mouth opened in shock and what looked like lavender white granny panties, gliding behind her like a cape. “EEEPP!!” Tsunade screamed as she flew and got stuck on the next wall. Her body was so stiff she almos looked like an arrow and the granny panties were now falling from out of the blonde’s pants towards the floor like a snowy, white waterfall.

“That is my counter-argument!” shouted Mei Terumi as she jumped through the hole and got behind Tsunade in a couple of long strides. The beautiful brown haired woman yanked Tsunade out of the wall by grabbing her panties and dragging her out “Ugh!” the blonde bombshell groaned as she was dragged through the floor by her fellow Kage and sent a quick glare to Mei “Ok, once I get up, you will know why I am the kage of this village!” Tsunade hissed between teeth but then grunted in discomfort as her panties were yanked yet again.

“We will see about that!” said Mei and then noticed the two women looking at her. They both had shock clearly written over their faces, but Osini was also trying her best not to snicker at the Hokage’s predicament. Mei smiled and then looked at Shizune “This may take a while, why don´t you take a brake while we discuss some...details?” Shizune looked at Mei, then at her groaning master and finaly sighed in defeat and nodded. Mei smiled again and dragged the moaning blonde woman back to the office, this time using the door instead of the floor.

After they were gone Osini started to giggle and looked at Shizune “Does this often happen here?”

Shizune massaged her forehead and sighed again “Yes, more than you would think. Now I need to clear my mind” she said before rising from her seat and the two of them went their separate ways. Osini couldn´t help but smile all the way to her home as she remembered Tsunade’s wedgie. Now she realy wanted to do the same with Kushina! The only problem was that it was Ino’s turn and she would have to wait until her daughter decided that she had enough. Osini frowned. That could take a while and by the way Ino looked when she realized she could do what she wanted with Kushina, maybe Osini would have to wait a long time.

Osini finaly reached her home and entered. She smirked as she heard the sound of embarassed grunts coming from one of the rooms. Ino was having a lot of fun it seemed! Osini left the notes on a table and went to the room to see how her daughter was doing. As she got closer, she noticed that the grunts and howls were...different. The tone, the ring of the moans was not Kushina’s, but it was still realy familiar. She opened the door and her jaw fell at what she saw “Tsume?!”

The wild, brown haired woman stopped grunting and Ino paused her pulls as she saw her mother looking at her from the door “Oh, hi mum! You got here early!” said the blonde girl. She had a good grip on Tsume’s red thong and she had positioned her victim and herself in a way that had the Inuzuka’s big butt and athletic legs in the air. It was a realy good wedgie and instantly, Osini felt her chest grow with pride for her daughter.

“Grr..Osini, tell your daughter to stop this!” shouted Tsume while she kicked her legs again. The woman grunted as the kicks only worsened her already painful wedgie “I am serious! She has poisoned me and deserves a good dose of discipline!”

Osini glanced at Tsume’s angry face and then at her sweat pants, were some flowers were sticking out. She smiled “The trick of the blue, mountain fang flower! That is a good one!” giggled Osini.

Tsume’s face became even redder with anger while Ino’s smile grew “Thanks! She was going to stop Kushina from doing her work, so I had to stop her somehow”

Osini nodded “You did good. Now, I don´t want to make Kushina feel like she is left out of this” she looked at the red haired woman and grinned when a deep groan was heard from under the bucket on Kushina’s head. Osini grabbed Kushina by the legholes of her underwear and lifted her making Kushina moan and weakly twitch her legs “Ready for some mother-daughter activity Ino?”

The blonde girl grinned and gave a hard yank to Tsume’s thong that made the woman howl “I am looking forward to it!”

12533222222221222221.content:
“C-can I come in K-kushina-san?” stuttered Hinata as she stood frozen infront of the door of the Uzumaki residence.

The red-haired woman infront of her rose an eyebrow. Why was Hinata so nervous? It was not the first time they talked and never had Kushina seen the Hyuuga heiress so incredibly nervous. The girl’s legs were trembling so bad, for a moment it seemed like Hinata was about to run away, but she still held her ground. Kushina just nodded at Hinata and gave her some space to enter. The woman’s curiosity made her watch the girl’s every move, to try and find out what was happening. Obviously, Hinata did not like this and felt a wave of cold sweat fall all over her skin.

Once they were in the living room and Kushina had brought some tea for Hinata to calm down, the Hyuuga heiress managed to finaly ask the question “Kushina-san...”

“Yes Hinata?”

“C-can I...date your son?” Hinata pressed the cup she was holding so hard as she said those words, she almost broke it. But Kushina did not even see that. The girl’s proposal left her stunned. Not mad, neither angry or happy. Just...surprised. Sure, she had seen Hinata’s interest in Naruto, but she had never expected the Hyuuga girl to actualy come to her home and ask her permission to date him! Kushina calmly set her own glass on the table.

“You want to date my son?” she asked calmly.

“Y-y-y..”Hinata gulped and nodded.

“Then first I will need to see how worthy you are” Kushina rose from her seat and gently pushed the table away “I will only let you go out with my son if you show that you are worth that privilage. Now...fight me”
